this folder contains all submodules.

# To add submodule use this syntax
* git submodule add https://github.com/g-truc/glm.git external/glm

* git submodule add https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glslang.git external/glslang

* git submodule add https://github.com/leethomason/tinyxml2.git external/tinyxml2

* git submodule add https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Headers.git external/Vulkan-Headers

* git submodule add https://github.com/glfw/glfw external/glfw
